TEXT.S: Jamaica hya' ga cyux maki' tay 18 15 N, 77 30 W na cung Meco syuw. kwara' kinghciyan niya' 10,991 sq km (maki' tay 168ginkgan kin wahci') (kinwhci' niya' ga 10,831 sq km , kinwhci' na lawsayan wsilung hya' ga 160 sq km) Kinkhmayan kwara' squliq hya' ga 2,970,340. Pinbcyan naha' sni' naha' rhzyal hya' iy pqmahun hya' ga 41.40 , lhlahuy hya' ga 31.10 , sni' naha' sa pptzyuwaw sa bzinah hya' ga 27.50 . spzyang qalang na Kokka' spzyang naha' krahu' qalang hya' ga Kingston. snyan kinramat inlungan na Kokka' snyan kinramat inlungan na Kokka' hya' ga na tay mspat byacing na qutux kawas. mrhuw Kokka' mrhuw Kokka' ta' misuw hya' ga Elizabeth II, aring ryax 6 squ byacing tay 2 sa kawas 1952 lga, musa' spazyang balay ms'rux kya la.
